title: Back pain linked to mental health problems and risky behaviors in teenagers

title_detail.value: Back pain linked to mental health problems and risky behaviors in teenagers

summary: A new study indicates that adolescents who experience back pain more frequently are also more likely to smoke cigarettes, drink alcohol, and report problems like anxiety and depression.

summary_detail.value: A new study indicates that adolescents who experience back pain more frequently are also more likely to smoke cigarettes, drink alcohol, and report problems like anxiety and depression.
